## AudioPlayerRequest interface

AudioPlayer requests handle audio life-cycle events such as playback started, playback stopped, playback failed, etc.

See [https://developer.amazon.com/public/solutions/alexa/alexa-skills-kit/docs/custom-audioplayer-interface-reference\#requests](https://developer.amazon.com/public/solutions/alexa/alexa-skills-kit/docs/custom-audioplayer-interface-reference#requests)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AudioPlayerRequest extends BaseRequest 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [BaseRequest](./stentor-models.baserequest.md)
